about_the_game:
Have you experienced the DZ Universe? Do you want to train like a Major champion? The Leviathan is your spiritual guide through this journey to greatness! Train like a true champion and enjoy this creative masterpiece while checking out the DarkZero Playerbase page to elevate your play to the next level!


DLC includes:
416-C ‘Leviathan’ Weapon Skin
9mm ‘Leviathan’ Weapon Skin
Shadow ‘Leviathan’ Weapon Skin

About DarkZero
Founded in 2018, DarkZero is a full-scale esports organization that combines state-of-the-art training and player development. With a deep passion for gaming, we strive to empower our players and to create innovative ways to watch and engage them with our fans.
Competing in both Rainbow Six: Siege and VALORANT, DarkZero is home to a plethora of world-class esports talent and aims to share their winning methods, vibrant personalities, and passion for esports with you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560 and up
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560 and up
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: DarkZero collaborated with Aimlabs to create this aimingly cool weapon skin.
